INDOOR SKETCH GET-TOGETHER

WHEN: 1-2 hours starting at the posted time

WHERE TO MEET: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. Let's meet in the Oak Bar.

DIRECTIONS: Either park at the Prudential center or take the Orange Stop at Back Bay. Copley is a block away.

THE SCENE: The Oak Bar has always been my, and a lot of people's, favorite gathering spot. With it's enormously high ceilings, posh relaxed decor, velvet drapes, it is breathtaking. On a Sunday afternoon there are few people there and it is a perfect spot for light sketching (I'll repeat this below, but decorum suggests nothing more than a sketchbook with pens or pencils).

OTHER: This is more of a travel session, so please pack extra light, ideally nothing more than a 5x8 sketchbook. Also, expect that we will converse while we sketch, unlike most BPAAG meet-ups. Finally, you will be expected to order a drink or appetizer. Drinks, food, even non-alcoholic ones, are pricey there, but not prohibitive.


IF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call the Inn or myself.

Michael Emerald
